Articles.Content: Hi all, I'm new on this forum, so sorry if I'm posting something that might have been answered before... But, I just downloaded the USI Kolonization Systems (MKS/OKS) with TAC last night to start a new Science campaign, and I was just wondering about what mods should I get in addition or tips with compatibility? I'm trying to stay as vanilla as possible, and I'm trying to use mods that still function with the most recent version of KSP. So far, it looks like Extraplanetary Launchpads will be helpful, and Infernal Robotics? Not sure how well they're supported with KSP 1.0+ though. I noticed that some of the MKS/OKS modules use other resources (Uranium and Xenon, I think?), and I was hoping that I didn't have to get an additional resource mining mod or something like that because I've yet to tinker with the new-KSP, stock ore-mining. Thanks in advance for any help you all can provide!
